org.apache.spark.util

Class ChildFirstURLClassLoader

  • Object
    • ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.apache.spark.util.MutableURLClassLoader
            • org.apache.spark.util.ChildFirstURLClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ChildFirstURLClassLoader
extends MutableURLClassLoader
    A mutable class loader that gives preference to its own URLs over the parent class loader when loading classes and resources.
